title: Three-dimensional total body photography, digital dermoscopy, and in vivo reflectance confocal microscopy for follow-up assessments of high-risk patients for …
details: S Hobelsberger, J Steininger, FE Meier, S Beissert… - Dermatology (Basel, Switzerland)
abstract: Introduction The combination of total body photography (TBP) and digital dermoscopy (DD) for monitoring patients with a high risk for melanoma can allow early detection of melanoma. This study aimed to examine if the use of three …
